name: Glimpse
headline: Glimpse is a suite of AI services for brands that sell in retail
description: Glimpse helps retail-first CPG brands automate their cash reconciliation process & fight invalid fees from their retailers & distributors using AI. Imagine a beverage company sold $100k worth of goods to Whole Foods & only got paid $60k. The deducted $40k comes in hundreds of long PDF’s with obscure codes that a team has to manually review every single one of to ensure the fees are valid. A % of these fees are always invalid and brands have to go through a lengthy process to get back money owed to them. We automate this whole process - saving a brand dozens of hours a week & recouping them 2-3% of their topline sales.

# Automate yourKeHE & UNFI deduction management
Glimpse **automatically** pulls in deductions, files disputes on your behalf, and streamlines the reconciliation process... faster and cheaper than any alternative.

Trusted by dozens of leading retail-first CPG brands
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c9c909ef411ecb7d592f43/66caf8af7aa15f20b69d9bb2_logo--dab_of_zabs.avif)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c9c909ef411ecb7d592f43/67b50b075695de82565fb997_parchextra_600x200.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c9c909ef411ecb7d592f43/66caf8afaf311149db7d2a0f_logo--genio.avif)
## How it works
The first E2E deductions service powered by AI.
### AutomatedCategorization
Glimpse AI swiftly imports and categorizes your KeHE & UNFI deductions in real-time, saving hours of manual work.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c9c909ef411ecb7d592f43/66cafcc20a46c56a0965bbcb_illustration--home--how_it_works--01.avif)
### AI Dispute Engine
Our platform automatically pinpoints invalid deductions, files disputes on your behalf, and follows up until unjustified claims are repaid.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c9c909ef411ecb7d592f43/66cafcc265cc558df7ccf72f_illustration--home--how_it_works--02.avif)
### IntegratedReconciliation
Glimpse streamlines the entire credit memo reconciliation process with built-in integrations to Quickbooks and Netsuite.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c9c909ef411ecb7d592f43/66cafcc24d9df16f0c4c1af7_illustration--home--how_it_works--03.avif)
"I love what you guys have built—this is perfect. You’ve really done your research and created a tool that directly solves the pain points of deductions management. We were struggling with data accuracy and a disconnected system before, but with Glimpse, we can easily track deductions, streamline disputes, and gain more control over our trade spend."
Kevin Chanthasiriphan
Co-Founder, immi
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c9c909ef411ecb7d592f43/67b4e723aa243789d41c8673_kchan%201.png)
Categorization
Glimpse uses innovative technology to pull in old and new deductions into the dashboard, updating daily. Using advanced AI, Glimpse categorizes every deduction and extracts relevant details like retailers, SKUs, and more so you have full visibility into your deductions.
Disputes
Your in-house deductions expert handles every dispute for you, combining your internal data sources with expert-crafted strategies for thorough dispute investigations. We analyze marketing calendars and update ERPs to freight documents to build a comprehensive dispute playbook.
Accounting
Glimpse streamlines the reconciliation process of your deductions by mapping our categorizations to your chart of accounts and providing integrations to QBO and Netsuite.
![Categorization](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cb14f15d0a1463b6a2c6b6/66cb2664dde493cf814b5c82_illustration--home--tabs-01.png)
![Disputes](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cb14f15d0a1463b6a2c6b6/66cb266d4d9df16f0c6f945d_illustration--home--tabs-02.png)
![Accounting](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cb14f15d0a1463b6a2c6b6/66cb26739a584c428864624e_illustration--home--tabs-03.png)
![Accounting](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cb14f15d0a1463b6a2c6b6/66cb26739a584c428864624e_illustration--home--tabs-03.png)
### Accounting
Glimpse streamlines the reconciliation process of your deductions by mapping our categorizations to your chart of accounts and providing integrations to QBO and Netsuite.
![Disputes](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cb14f15d0a1463b6a2c6b6/66cb266d4d9df16f0c6f945d_illustration--home--tabs-02.png)
### Disputes
Your in-house deductions expert handles every dispute for you, combining your internal data sources with expert-crafted strategies for thorough dispute investigations. We analyze marketing calendars and update ERPs to freight documents to build a comprehensive dispute playbook.
![Categorization](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66cb14f15d0a1463b6a2c6b6/66cb2664dde493cf814b5c82_illustration--home--tabs-01.png)
### Categorization
Glimpse uses innovative technology to pull in old and new deductions into the dashboard, updating daily. Using advanced AI, Glimpse categorizes every deduction and extracts relevant details like retailers, SKUs, and more so you have full visibility into your deductions.
## Streamline deductions with AI
Reimagine deductions management with Glimpse and save time, money, and energy.
Save time
### Reclaim 10s of hours per week
Glimpse AI swiftly imports and categorizes your KeHE & UNFI deductions in real-time, saving hours of manual work.
Rapid results
### We win when you win
Eliminate delays by streamlining each dispute. Recover up to 10% of deductions on average. We only take a cut of what we get back for you instead of an hourly rate.
Risk-free
### Easy to get started
Experience Glimpse on a success-based pricing model, with monthly payment and easy opt-out. Historical deductions analysis drives immediate value during onboarding.
“We have been utilizing the Glimpse platform for the past 6 months to put our deductions on autopilot and the results have been immensely exciting! Our accounting team also uses Glimpse to streamline the cash application process. The Glimpse team has been super quick to respond to questions and have been a great team to work with. We highly recommend”
**Emily Griffith**
CEO & Founder, Lil Bucks
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c9c909ef411ecb7d592f43/67865d00e99c25f6d84922cb_unnamed%201.jpg)
## FAQs
Do you have humans or is it all AI? 
There will always be a human in the loop - we have a team of in-house deductions experts, one of whom will be dedicated to your business. Glimpse makes these deductions experts much more efficient, using AI that we trained on expert playbooks.
Do you just focus on KeHE & UNFI? 
Right now, our end to end process of pulling in data, applying AI, and disputing is focused on KeHE & UNFI. We are currently launching new distributors & retailers like CVS and Target, with more to come. We have this level of focus to ensure maximum output & quality control are balanced.
Is it annoying to get started?
It's not annoying at all. Think about Glimpse as a done-for-you service, not another tool your team has to manage. After a 30 minute onboarding call, we handle all of the day-to-day management of your deductions and disputes, so you can focus on selling in new accounts and building your brand.
How does pricing work? 
We have a blended model of a low monthly fee & a commission on money that we get back from successful disputes. The monthly fee is based on document processing which is tied to the volume of business you're doing with each distributor.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Glimpse**

Glimpse, founded in 2020 and part of Y Combinator's S20 batch, is based in New York and operates with a lean team of three. The company has effectively carved out a niche by leveraging artificial intelligence to help retail-first consumer packaged goods (CPG) brands manage their finances more efficiently. 

**Mission & Services**

The primary mission of Glimpse is straightforward: to automate tedious cash reconciliation processes for brands that sell in retail. Let's break that down. Picture a beverage company that sells $100k worth of product to Whole Foods but only receives a meager $60k due to a slew of unexplained deductions. These deductions can be buried within mountains of paperwork, often making it hard to ascertain their validity. 

Glimpse steps in here, automating the entire deduction management process. By using AI to analyze and dispute these deductions, Glimpse helps brands reclaim invalid fees efficiently—recovering 2-3% of their top-line sales and saving dozens of hours of backbreaking manual work each week. 

**Key Features and Functionality**

1. **Automated Categorization:** The platform swiftly imports and categorizes deductions in real-time, allowing brands to regain precious hours of their time.
   
2. **AI Dispute Engine:** Your in-house deductions expert can automatically identify invalid deductions, file disputes, and ensure follow-ups until any unjustified claims are resolved.

3. **Integrated Reconciliation:** Glimpse streamlines the reconciliation of credit memos with integrations to popular accounting software like QuickBooks and NetSuite.

Glimpse operates on a success-based pricing model—essentially, they only make money when their clients do. This risk-free approach involves a low monthly fee coupled with a commission on recovered funds from successful disputes.

**Current Focus and Growth Potential**

While they currently excel in handling deductions from suppliers like KeHE and UNFI, they're in the process of expanding to include other major retailers like CVS and Target. This keen focus allows for maximum efficiency and quality control, addressing vital pain points for brands eager to reclaim their money without drowning in paperwork.

Overall, Glimpse isn’t just a tool; it’s a formidable partner in the retail finance landscape, backed by key players like Gustaf Alstromer, a Group Partner at Y Combinator. 

If you're a brand feeling overwhelmed by deduction disputes and accounting headaches, Glimpse might just be the lifeline you’ve been looking for. 

For more information, check them out at [Glimpse](https://tryglimpse.com).
